website_summaries.verdict: A quality low-fat food by a trusted brand that's often recommended by veterinarians for dogs that have difficulties digesting fat.
pros: Low-fat recipe formulated for dogs with sensitive digestive systems
Great for dogs with health issues like pancreatitis that can make digesting food with high-fat content difficult
Contains prebiotic fiber that aids digestion and may calm diarrhea
cons: Reports of damaged cans upon arrival
Most dogs like it, but some weren't tempted by the flavor

customer_reviews.title: YAY MY DOGS LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: Recommended by my vet. I have a very finicky dog that needs to take a lot of medication twice a day with food or her stomach will hurt. She turns her nose up at 90 percent of everything I tried. EVERYTHING! I finally started making her chicken and rice for her meals. But then she was not getting full nutrition. ARGH! But she Woolf’s this stuff down as if it was fillet mignon and she’s now getting a much more balanced diet as well. So relieved. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: SF Artist

customer_reviews.title: My dog likes it
customer_reviews.text: It is a good quality dog food and my dog really likes it as it is just what she needs for her digestive condition. It is expensive but effective, I just wish it would come in smaller cans
customer_reviews.author: AndreyA

customer_reviews.title: Literally the only food my dog can eat
customer_reviews.text: Purina Pro dog food has helped my sensitive dog tremendously. He likes the taste, and it’s all good with his GI tract. Thank you! Purchased through VetInternetCo, a prompt delivery every time!
customer_reviews.author: Janet M. Parlato

customer_reviews.title: Good price & fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Our special needs dog loves this food. We had one can dented in but opened it and it looked fine inside.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon in Texas

customer_reviews.title: ... dog on this An still after 8 months doing great
customer_reviews.text: Dr put our dog on this An still after 8 months doing great
customer_reviews.author: P. Vaughan

customer_reviews.title: Does not look like EN from my vet
customer_reviews.text: This does not look like the Brand En that I get from the vet. It says low fat but it looks like half fat. Will go back to my vet, it’s less expensive and looks like better dog food.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Questionable product- don’t risk it.
customer_reviews.text: Cans came and they are super rusty. Also, my vet says that I actually should not have been able to buy these from any old vendor, and that I would actually need a prescription. Anyhow, the cans advertised in the image advertised are different than the cans I got. I assumed I was getting the “naturals” version and instead I got low fat. I’d like my 50 dollars back.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Dogs love this food can't use it as much as I want because it's too expensive
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Glauner

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves the taste.
customer_reviews.text: Recommended by my vet. The dog loves it but then my dogs loves hot sauce and poop.
customer_reviews.author: Eve London

customer_reviews.title: Pricey
customer_reviews.text: The product is good. The price is much higher then my Vet and Chewy.com
customer_reviews.author: K lee

customer_reviews.title: Dog ate it.
customer_reviews.text: It asked what I thought of the flavor. I'll be honest, I didn't taste it. Needed ot in a pinch for my diabetic dog. He seemed to like it. A bit spendy though.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Bland
customer_reviews.text: My Cavalier refuses to eat. He loves the one which is not fat free
customer_reviews.author: VMOSKWA

customer_reviews.title: like it was purchased at a damaged good sale
customer_reviews.text: Every can was dented a lot, like it was purchased at a damaged good sale. I was afraid to use so I tossed it out with the trash. Don’t buy from this vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Price is literally half of what it is here at ...
customer_reviews.text: Price is literally half of what it is here at Petco. My wife did not look at this now we are out $30, thanks Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely dented
customer_reviews.text: Needed to fill quickly for my dog so found this on Amazon. However, all cans were extremely dented!!!
customer_reviews.author: Disappointed

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My dog has bad colitis with bloody diarrhea. Veterinarian said these are great for my dog. It is expensive and also need a script from veterinarian before you buy it. My dog loves this food and never leaves a crumb behind. Wish it was a bit cheaper but id do anything for my fur brother.
customer_reviews.author: Dougiet27

customer_reviews.title: Discoloration inside of can
customer_reviews.text: Product had a rust looking coloration inside of the can... suggest purchasing from your veterinarian for the same cost..
customer_reviews.author: Christine Hoester

customer_reviews.title: This dog food is really great for my Shih Tzu who has a sensitive stomach ...
customer_reviews.text: This dog food is really great for my Shih Tzu who has a sensitive stomach and I have tried just about everything! I'm now feeding both my dogs this food and they love it and so do I! Last summer when we traveled with both dogs in a camper all over the country I couldn't find it anywhere with one exception but I just couldn't buy it over the counter without seeing a vet and getting a huge bill. I took some with me as a just in case food and we went through it fast..Im happy to see Amazon has it so when this happens again I can just order it..My vet is a lot cheaper!
customer_reviews.author: susan lewis

customer_reviews.title: DUH?!
customer_reviews.text: I love my dog, but my child doesn’t eat this well!!
customer_reviews.author: Dissatisfied
